name: Citadel 0.5.0
notes: Important note: This update can not be installed directly through the dashboard. Instead, please first download the channels.backup, make sure you got your 24 words written down, then follow this guide here: https://forum.runcitadel.space/d/6-announcing-citadel-050-independence If you are not on a Raspberry Pi, please wait until instructions become available.
